title: [BUG][JAVA] additionalModelTypeAnnotations adds lombok annotation to abstract class AbstractOpenApiSchema
description:
Bug Report Checklist

  • Have you provided a full/minimal spec to reproduce the issue?
  • Have you validated the input using an OpenAPI validator (example)?
  • Have you tested with the latest master to confirm the issue still exists?
  • Have you searched for related issues/PRs?
  • What's the actual output vs expected output?
  • [Optional] Sponsorship to speed up the bug fix or feature request (example)
Description
${spec-temp-dir}/api.yaml java ">
     
                org.openapitools
                openapi-generator-maven-plugin
                6.6.0
                
                    
                        
                            generate
                        
                        
                            
                                @lombok.AllArgsConstructor;@lombok.Builder(toBuilder = true,builderClassName = "Builder")
                            
                            ${spec-temp-dir}/api.yaml
                            java

The generated abstract class AbstractOpenApiSchema also has the lombok annotation, which causes a compiler failure, "AbstractOpenApiSchema is abstract; cannot be instantiated". Is there a way to tell the plugin to ignore this class?

openapi-generator version

openapi-generator-maven-plugin:6.6.0
